custom-sql.sql: SELECT Count(DISTINCT HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM COMPANY_MASTER CM JOIN CONTRACT_MASTER CONT ON CONT.CONT_HOLD_COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_STATUS AND HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT distinct HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS FROM COMPANY_MASTER CM JOIN CONTRACT_MASTER CONT ON CONT.CONT_HOLD_COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_STATUS AND HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' GROUP BY HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION ORDER BY HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT Count(DISTINCT HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM COMPANY_MASTER CM JOIN CONTRACT_MASTER CONT ON CONT.CONT_HOLD_COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_TYPE AND HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS FROM COMPANY_MASTER CM JOIN CONTRACT_MASTER CONT ON CONT.CONT_HOLD_COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_TYPE AND HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' GROUP BY HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION ORDER BY HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT distinct CM.COMPANY_ID, CM.COMPANY_NO, CM.COMPANY_NAME, HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID FROM COMPANY_MASTER CM JOIN CONTRACT_MASTER CONT ON CONT.CONT_HOLD_COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID AND CM.COMPANY_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_STATUS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_TYPE ORDER BY HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION,HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT count( distinct CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID) FROM COMPANY_MASTER CM JOIN CONTRACT_MASTER CONT ON CONT.CONT_HOLD_COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID AND CM.COMPANY_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_STATUS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_TYPE
SELECT Count (DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM CONTRACT_MASTER CM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.CONTRACT_STATUS AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL.DESCRIPTION FROM CONTRACT_MASTER CM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.CONTRACT_STATUS AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count (DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM CONTRACT_MASTER CM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.CONTRACT_TYPE AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL.DESCRIPTION FROM CONTRACT_MASTER CM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.CONTRACT_TYPE AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT Count(DISTINCT CM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID) FROM CONTRACT_MASTER CM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.CONTRACT_STATUS AND CM.CONTRACT_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.CONTRACT_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.CONTRACT_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.CONTRACT_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.CONTRACT_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND CM.CONTRACT_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.CONTRACT_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.CONTRACT_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.CONTRACT_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.CONTRACT_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.CONTRACT_TYPE

SELECT DISTINCT CM.CONTRACT_ID, CM.CONTRACT_NO, CM.CONTRACT_NAME, HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION AS STA , HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION AS C_TYPE, CM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID FROM CONTRACT_MASTER CM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.CONTRACT_STATUS AND CM.CONTRACT_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.CONTRACT_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.CONTRACT_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.CONTRACT_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.CONTRACT_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND CM.CONTRACT_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.CONTRACT_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.CONTRACT_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.CONTRACT_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.CONTRACT_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.CONTRACT_TYPE ORDER BY HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION,HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count (DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM COMPANY_MASTER CM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_STATUS AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL.DESCRIPTION FROM COMPANY_MASTER CM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_STATUS AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count (DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM COMPANY_MASTER CM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_TYPE AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL.DESCRIPTION FROM COMPANY_MASTER CM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_TYPE AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT Count(DISTINCT CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID) FROM COMPANY_MASTER CM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_STATUS AND CM.COMPANY_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_TYPE
JOIN CFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS CFD ON CFD.COMPANY_MASTER_SID=CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID JOIN CFP_CONTRACT CFC ON CFC.CFP_CONTRACT_SID=CFD.CFP_CONTRACT_SID

SELECT DISTINCT CM.COMPANY_ID, CM.COMPANY_NO, CM.COMPANY_NAME, HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID FROM COMPANY_MASTER CM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_STATUS AND CM.COMPANY_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.COMPANY_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CM.COMPANY_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_TYPE
JOIN CFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS CFD ON CFD.COMPANY_MASTER_SID=CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID JOIN CFP_CONTRACT CFC ON CFC.CFP_CONTRACT_SID=CFD.CFP_CONTRACT_SID ORDER BY HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION,HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count(DISTINCT HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM CFP_CONTRACT CFP JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CFP.CFP_STATUS AND HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION FROM CFP_CONTRACT CFP JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CFP.CFP_STATUS AND HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count(DISTINCT HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM CFP_CONTRACT CFP JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CFP.CFP_TYPE AND HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION FROM CFP_CONTRACT CFP JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CFP.CFP_TYPE AND HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT CC.CFP_MODEL_SID) FROM CFP_CONTRACT CC JOIN CFP_MODEL CM ON CM.CFP_MODEL_SID = CC.CFP_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_STATUS AND CM.CFP_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.CFP_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.CFP_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CC.CFP_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CC.CFP_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND CM.CFP_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.CFP_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.CFP_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CC.CFP_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CC.CFP_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TY ON TY.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_TYPE

SELECT DISTINCT CM.CFP_ID, CM.CFP_NO, CM.CFP_NAME, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, TY.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, CC.CFP_CONTRACT_SID FROM CFP_CONTRACT CC JOIN CFP_MODEL CM ON CM.CFP_MODEL_SID = CC.CFP_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_STATUS AND CM.CFP_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.CFP_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.CFP_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CC.CFP_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CC.CFP_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND CM.CFP_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.CFP_NO LIKE '?' AND CM.CFP_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CC.CFP_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CC.CFP_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TY ON TY.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_TYPE ORDER BY ST.DESCRIPTION,TY.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

select count(*) from ( SELECT DISTINCT CM.CFP_ID, CM.CFP_NO, CM.CFP_NAME, TYP.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, CAT.DESCRIPTION AS CATEGORY, CM.CFP_DESIGNATION, '' AS CFP_PLAN_ID, '' AS CFP_PLAN_NAME, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, TC.DESCRIPTION AS TRADE_CLASS, CM.CFP_START_DATE AS START_DAT, CM.CFP_END_DATE AS ENDDATE FROM CFP_CONTRACT CC JOIN CFP_MODEL CM ON CM.CFP_MODEL_SID = CC.CFP_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_STATUS AND CM.CFP_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.CFP_NAME LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE CAT ON CAT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_CATEGORY AND CAT.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ? AND CM.CFP_NO LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TYP ON TYP.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_TYPE AND TYP.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CC.CFP_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' ? JOIN HELPER_TABLE TC ON TC.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_TRADE_CLASS ? ) C

SELECT DISTINCT CM.CFP_ID, CM.CFP_NO, CM.CFP_NAME, TYP.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, CAT.DESCRIPTION AS CATEGORY, CM.CFP_DESIGNATION, '' AS CFP_PLAN_ID, '' AS CFP_PLAN_NAME, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, TC.DESCRIPTION AS TRADE_CLASS, CM.CFP_START_DATE AS START_DAT, CM.CFP_END_DATE AS ENDDATE FROM CFP_CONTRACT CC JOIN CFP_MODEL CM ON CM.CFP_MODEL_SID = CC.CFP_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_STATUS AND CM.CFP_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.CFP_NAME LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE CAT ON CAT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_CATEGORY AND CAT.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ? AND CM.CFP_NO LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TYP ON TYP.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_TYPE AND TYP.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CC.CFP_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' ? JOIN HELPER_TABLE TC ON TC.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_TRADE_CLASS ? ORDER BY CM.CFP_START_DATE,CM.CFP_END_DATE ASC OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT Count(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT CM.CFP_ID, CM.CFP_NO, CM.CFP_NAME, TY.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, CAT.DESCRIPTION AS cat, CM.CFP_DESIGNATION AS DES, NULL AS PLAN_ID, NULL AS PLAN_NAME, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, TRADE.DESCRIPTION AS TRADE, CC.CFP_START_DATE, CC.CFP_END_DATE, CC.CFP_CONTRACT_SID FROM CFP_CONTRACT CC JOIN CFP_MODEL CM ON CM.CFP_MODEL_SID = CC.CFP_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_STATUS AND CM.CFP_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.CFP_NAME LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE CAT ON CAT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_CATEGORY AND CAT.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ? AND CM.CFP_NO LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TYEP ON TYEP.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.CFP_TYPE AND TYEP.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CC.CFP_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' ? JOIN HELPER_TABLE TY ON TY.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_TYPE JOIN HELPER_TABLE TRADE ON TRADE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_TRADE_CLASS ? ) COU

SELECT DISTINCT CM.CFP_ID as CFP_ID, CM.CFP_NO, CM.CFP_NAME, TY.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, CAT.DESCRIPTION AS cat, CM.CFP_DESIGNATION AS DES, NULL AS PLAN_ID, NULL AS PLAN_NAME, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, TRADE.DESCRIPTION AS TRADE, CC.CFP_START_DATE, CC.CFP_END_DATE, CC.CFP_CONTRACT_SID FROM CFP_CONTRACT CC JOIN CFP_MODEL CM ON CM.CFP_MODEL_SID = CC.CFP_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_STATUS AND CM.CFP_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.CFP_NAME LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE CAT ON CAT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_CATEGORY AND CAT.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ? AND CM.CFP_NO LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TYEP ON TYEP.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.CFP_TYPE AND TYEP.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CC.CFP_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' ? JOIN HELPER_TABLE TY ON TY.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_TYPE JOIN HELPER_TABLE TRADE ON TRADE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.CFP_TRADE_CLASS ? ORDER BY ST.DESCRIPTION,TY.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count(DISTINCT HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM IFP_CONTRACT IFP JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IFP.IFP_STATUS AND HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION FROM IFP_CONTRACT IFP JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IFP.IFP_STATUS AND HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count(DISTINCT HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM IFP_CONTRACT IFP JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IFP.IFP_TYPE AND HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION FROM IFP_CONTRACT IFP JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IFP.IFP_TYPE AND HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT IC.IFP_MODEL_SID) FROM IFP_CONTRACT IC JOIN IFP_MODEL IM ON IM.IFP_MODEL_SID = IC.IFP_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IC.IFP_STATUS AND IM.IFP_ID LIKE '?' AND IM.IFP_NO LIKE '?' AND IM.IFP_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IC.IFP_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IC.IFP_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND IM.IFP_ID LIKE '?' AND IM.IFP_NO LIKE '?' AND IM.IFP_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IC.IFP_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IC.IFP_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TY ON TY.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IC.IFP_TYPE

SELECT DISTINCT IM.IFP_ID, IM.IFP_NO, IM.IFP_NAME, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, TY.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, IC.IFP_CONTRACT_SID FROM IFP_CONTRACT IC JOIN IFP_MODEL IM ON IM.IFP_MODEL_SID = IC.IFP_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IC.IFP_STATUS AND IM.IFP_ID LIKE '?' AND IM.IFP_NO LIKE '?' AND IM.IFP_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IC.IFP_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IC.IFP_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND IM.IFP_ID LIKE '?' AND IM.IFP_NO LIKE '?' AND IM.IFP_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IC.IFP_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IC.IFP_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TY ON TY.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IC.IFP_TYPE ORDER BY ST.DESCRIPTION,TY.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT DISTINCT CM.IFP_ID, CM.IFP_NO, CM.IFP_NAME, TYP.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, CAT.DESCRIPTION AS CATEGORY, DESG.DESCRIPTION AS DESG, '' AS CFP_PLAN_ID, '' AS CFP_PLAN_NAME, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, CM.IFP_START_DATE AS START_DAT, CM.IFP_END_DATE AS ENDDATE FROM IFP_CONTRACT CC JOIN IFP_MODEL CM ON CM.IFP_MODEL_SID = CC.IFP_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.IFP_STATUS AND CM.IFP_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.IFP_NAME LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE CAT ON CAT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.IFP_CATEGORY AND CAT.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ? AND CM.IFP_NO LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TYP ON TYP.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.IFP_TYPE AND TYP.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CC.IFP_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE DESG ON DESG.HELPER_TABLE_SID=CM.IFP_DESIGNATION ? ? ) C

SELECT DISTINCT CM.IFP_ID, CM.IFP_NO, CM.IFP_NAME, TYP.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, CAT.DESCRIPTION AS CATEGORY, DESG.DESCRIPTION AS DESG, '' AS CFP_PLAN_ID, '' AS CFP_PLAN_NAME, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, CM.IFP_START_DATE AS START_DAT, CM.IFP_END_DATE AS ENDDATE FROM IFP_CONTRACT CC JOIN IFP_MODEL CM ON CM.IFP_MODEL_SID = CC.IFP_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.IFP_STATUS AND CM.IFP_ID LIKE '?' AND CM.IFP_NAME LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE CAT ON CAT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.IFP_CATEGORY AND CAT.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ? AND CM.IFP_NO LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TYP ON TYP.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CC.IFP_TYPE AND TYP.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' AND Isnull(CC.IFP_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE DESG ON DESG.HELPER_TABLE_SID=CM.IFP_DESIGNATION ? ? ORDER BY CM.IFP_START_DATE,CM.IFP_END_DATE ASC OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT IFP_M.IFP_NO, IFP_C.IFP_NAME, IFP_TYPE.description AS IFP_TYPE, IFP_Cat.DESCRIPTION AS IFP_CAt, IFP_D.DESCRIPTION AS IFP_DE, NULL AS IFP_Plan, NULL AS IFP_PLAN_name, IFP_S.DESCRIPTION AS IFP_STATUS6, IFP_C.IFP_START_DATE, IFP_C.IFP_END_DATE, IFP_C.IFP_CONTRACT_SID FROM IFP_CONTRACT IFP_C JOIN IFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS IFP_CD ON IFP_C.IFP_CONTRACT_SID = IFP_CD.IFP_CONTRACT_SID AND ( IFP_C.IFP_NAME LIKE '?' ) JOIN IFP_MODEL IFP_M ON IFP_M.IFP_MODEL_SID = IFP_C.IFP_MODEL_sid AND ( IFP_M.IFP_NO LIKE '?' ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE IFP_TYPE ON IFP_C.IFP_TYPE = IFP_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( IFP_TYPE.description LIKE '?' OR IFP_TYPE.description IS NULL ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE IFP_S ON IFP_C.IFP_STATUS = IFP_S.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( IFP_C.IFP_STATUS LIKE '?' ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE IFP_Cat ON IFP_C.IFP_CATEGORY = IFP_Cat.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( IFP_Cat.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' OR IFP_Cat.DESCRIPTION IS NULL ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE IFP_D ON IFP_C.IFP_DESIGNATION = IFP_D.HELPER_TABLE_SID ? ? ? )CIFP

SELECT DISTINCT IFP_NO, IFP_C.IFP_NAME, IFP_TYPE.description AS IFP_TYPE, IFP_Cat.DESCRIPTION AS IFP_CAt, IFP_D.DESCRIPTION AS IFP_DE, NULL AS IFP_Plan, NULL AS IFP_PLAN_name, IFP_S.DESCRIPTION AS IFP_STATUS6, IFP_C.IFP_START_DATE, IFP_C.IFP_END_DATE, IFP_C.IFP_CONTRACT_SID FROM IFP_CONTRACT IFP_C JOIN IFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS IFP_CD ON IFP_C.IFP_CONTRACT_SID = IFP_CD.IFP_CONTRACT_SID AND ( IFP_C.IFP_NAME LIKE '?' ) JOIN IFP_MODEL IFP_M ON IFP_M.IFP_MODEL_SID = IFP_C.IFP_MODEL_sid AND ( IFP_M.IFP_NO LIKE '?' ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE IFP_TYPE ON IFP_C.IFP_TYPE = IFP_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( IFP_TYPE.description LIKE '?' OR IFP_TYPE.description IS NULL ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE IFP_S ON IFP_C.IFP_STATUS = IFP_S.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( IFP_C.IFP_STATUS LIKE '?' ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE IFP_Cat ON IFP_C.IFP_CATEGORY = IFP_Cat.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( IFP_Cat.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' OR IFP_Cat.DESCRIPTION IS NULL ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE IFP_D ON IFP_C.IFP_DESIGNATION = IFP_D.HELPER_TABLE_SID ? ? ?
ORDER BY IFP_C.IFP_CONTRACT_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count(DISTINCT HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM PS_CONTRACT PS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS.PS_STATUS AND HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION FROM PS_CONTRACT PS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS.PS_STATUS AND HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count(DISTINCT HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM PS_CONTRACT PS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS.PS_TYPE AND HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION FROM PS_CONTRACT PS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS.PS_TYPE AND HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT PC.PS_MODEL_SID) FROM PS_CONTRACT PC JOIN PS_MODEL PS ON PS.PS_MODEL_SID=PC.PS_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PC.PS_STATUS AND PS.PS_ID LIKE '?' AND PS.PS_NO LIKE '?' AND PS.PS_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull( PS.PS_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(PS.PS_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND PS.PS_ID LIKE '?' AND PS.PS_NO LIKE '?' AND PS.PS_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull( PS.PS_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(PS.PS_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TY ON TY.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PC.PS_TYPE

SELECT DISTINCT PS.PS_ID, PS.PS_NO, PS.PS_NAME, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, TY.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, PC.PS_CONTRACT_SID FROM PS_CONTRACT PC JOIN PS_MODEL PS ON PS.PS_MODEL_SID = PC.PS_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PC.PS_STATUS AND PS.PS_ID LIKE '?' AND PS.PS_NO LIKE '?' AND PS.PS_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(PS.PS_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(PS.PS_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND PS.PS_ID LIKE '?' AND PS.PS_NO LIKE '?' AND PS.PS_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(PS.PS_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(PS.PS_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TY ON TY.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PC.PS_TYPE ORDER BY ST.DESCRIPTION,TY.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT PS.PS_ID, PS.PS_NO, PS.PS_NAME, CAT.DESCRIPTION AS CATEGORY, TYP.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, desig.DESCRIPTION AS DESIG, PS.PARENT_PS_ID AS PPSID, PS.PARENT_PS_NAME AS PPSNAME, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, PS.PS_START_DATE AS START_DAT, PS.PS_END_DATE AS ENDDATE, TC.DESCRIPTION AS TRADECLASS FROM PS_CONTRACT PC JOIN PS_MODEL PS ON PS.PS_MODEL_SID = PC.PS_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PC.PS_STATUS AND PS.PS_ID LIKE '?' AND PS.PS_NAME LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE CAT ON CAT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PC.PS_CATEGORY AND CAT.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ? AND PS.PS_NO LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TYP ON TYP.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PC.PS_TYPE AND TYP.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' AND Isnull(PC.PS_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TC ON TC.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS.PS_TRADE_CLASS JOIN HELPER_TABLE desig ON desig.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS.PS_DESIGNATION ? ? ) C

SELECT DISTINCT PS.PS_ID, PS.PS_NO, PS.PS_NAME, CAT.DESCRIPTION AS CATEGORY, TYP.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, desig.DESCRIPTION AS DESIG, PS.PARENT_PS_ID AS PPSID, PS.PARENT_PS_NAME AS PPSNAME, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, PS.PS_START_DATE AS START_DAT, PS.PS_END_DATE AS ENDDATE, TC.DESCRIPTION AS TRADECLASS FROM PS_CONTRACT PC JOIN PS_MODEL PS ON PS.PS_MODEL_SID = PC.PS_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PC.PS_STATUS AND PS.PS_ID LIKE '?' AND PS.PS_NAME LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE CAT ON CAT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PC.PS_CATEGORY AND CAT.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ? AND PS.PS_NO LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TYP ON TYP.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PC.PS_TYPE AND TYP.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' AND Isnull(PC.PS_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE TC ON TC.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS.PS_TRADE_CLASS JOIN HELPER_TABLE desig ON desig.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS.PS_DESIGNATION ? ? ORDER BY PS.PS_START_DATE,PS.PS_END_DATE ASC OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT PS_M.PS_NO, PS_C.PS_NAME, PS_TYPE.description AS PS_TYPE1, PS_Cat.DESCRIPTION AS PS_CAt, PS_T.DESCRIPTION AS TRADE, PS_D.DESCRIPTION AS PS_DE, NULL AS PS_Plan, NULL AS PS_PLAN_name, PS_S.DESCRIPTION AS PS_STATUS6, PS_C.PS_START_DATE, PS_C.PS_END_DATE, PS_C.PS_CONTRACT_SID FROM PS_CONTRACT PS_C JOIN PS_CONTRACT_DETAILS PS_CD ON PS_C.PS_CONTRACT_SID = PS_CD.PS_CONTRACT_SID AND ( PS_C.PS_NAME LIKE '?' ) JOIN PS_MODEL PS_M ON PS_C.PS_MODEL_SID = PS_M.PS_MODEL_SID AND ( PS_M.PS_NO LIKE '?' ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PS_TYPE ON PS_C.PS_TYPE = PS_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( PS_TYPE.description LIKE '?' OR PS_TYPE.description IS NULL ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PS_S ON PS_C.PS_STATUS = PS_S.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( PS_C.PS_STATUS LIKE '?' ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PS_Cat ON PS_C.PS_CATEGORY = PS_Cat.HELPER_TABLE_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PS_D ON PS_C.PS_DESIGNATION = PS_D.HELPER_TABLE_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PS_T ON PS_M.PS_TRADE_CLASS = PS_T.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( PS_Cat.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' OR PS_Cat.DESCRIPTION IS NULL ) ? ? ? ) CPS

SELECT PS_M.PS_NO, PS_C.PS_NAME, PS_TYPE.description AS PS_TYPE1, PS_Cat.DESCRIPTION AS PS_CAt, PS_T.DESCRIPTION AS TRADE, PS_D.DESCRIPTION AS PS_DE, NULL AS PS_Plan, NULL AS PS_PLAN_name, PS_S.DESCRIPTION AS PS_STATUS6, PS_C.PS_START_DATE, PS_C.PS_END_DATE, PS_C.PS_CONTRACT_SID FROM PS_CONTRACT PS_C JOIN PS_CONTRACT_DETAILS PS_CD ON PS_C.PS_CONTRACT_SID = PS_CD.PS_CONTRACT_SID AND ( PS_C.PS_NAME LIKE '?' ) JOIN PS_MODEL PS_M ON PS_C.PS_MODEL_SID = PS_M.PS_MODEL_SID AND ( PS_M.PS_NO LIKE '?' ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PS_TYPE ON PS_C.PS_TYPE = PS_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( PS_TYPE.description LIKE '?' OR PS_TYPE.description IS NULL ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PS_S ON PS_C.PS_STATUS = PS_S.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( PS_C.PS_STATUS LIKE '?' ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PS_Cat ON PS_C.PS_CATEGORY = PS_Cat.HELPER_TABLE_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PS_D ON PS_C.PS_DESIGNATION = PS_D.HELPER_TABLE_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PS_T ON PS_M.PS_TRADE_CLASS = PS_T.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( PS_Cat.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' OR PS_Cat.DESCRIPTION IS NULL ) ? ? ?
ORDER BY PS_C.PS_CONTRACT_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count(DISTINCT HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM RS_CONTRACT RS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS.RS_STATUS AND HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION FROM RS_CONTRACT RS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS.RS_STATUS AND HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count(DISTINCT HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM RS_CONTRACT RS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS.RS_TYPE AND HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION FROM RS_CONTRACT RS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS.RS_TYPE AND HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT Count(RC.RS_MODEL_SID) FROM RS_CONTRACT RC JOIN RS_MODEL RS ON RS.RS_MODEL_SID = RC.RS_MODEL_SID AND RS.RS_ID LIKE '?' AND RS.RS_NO LIKE '?' AND RC.RS_NAME LIKE '?' AND ( RC.RS_STATUS LIKE '?' OR RC.RS_STATUS IS NULL ) AND ( RC.RS_TYPE LIKE '?' OR RC.RS_TYPE IS NULL ) AND RS.RS_ID LIKE '?' AND RS.RS_NO LIKE '?' AND RC.RS_NAME LIKE '?' AND ( RC.RS_STATUS LIKE '?' OR RC.RS_STATUS IS NULL ) AND ( RC.RS_TYPE LIKE '?' OR RC.RS_TYPE IS NULL ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RC.RS_STATUS JOIN HELPER_TABLE TY ON TY.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RC.RS_TYPE

SELECT DISTINCT RS.RS_ID, RS.RS_NO, RS.RS_NAME, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, TY.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, RC.RS_CONTRACT_SID FROM RS_CONTRACT RC JOIN RS_MODEL RS ON RS.RS_MODEL_SID = RC.RS_MODEL_SID AND RS.RS_ID LIKE '?' AND RS.RS_NO LIKE '?' AND RC.RS_NAME LIKE '?' AND ( RC.RS_STATUS LIKE '?' OR RC.RS_STATUS IS NULL ) AND ( RC.RS_TYPE LIKE '?' OR RC.RS_TYPE IS NULL ) AND RS.RS_ID LIKE '?' AND RS.RS_NO LIKE '?' AND RC.RS_NAME LIKE '?' AND ( RC.RS_STATUS LIKE '?' OR RC.RS_STATUS IS NULL ) AND ( RC.RS_TYPE LIKE '?' OR RC.RS_TYPE IS NULL ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RC.RS_STATUS JOIN HELPER_TABLE TY ON TY.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RC.RS_TYPE ORDER BY ST.DESCRIPTION, TY.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT RS_M.RS_ID, RS_M.RS_NO, RS_C.RS_NAME, RS_TYPE.description AS RS_TYPE1, RS_C.REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE, RS_Cat.DESCRIPTION AS RS_CAt, rs_c.RS_TRADE_CLASS, RS_C.RS_DESIGNATION, RS_C.PARENT_RS_ID, RS_C.PARENT_RS_NAME, RS_S.DESCRIPTION AS RS_STATUS6, RS_C.RS_START_DATE, RS_C.RS_END_DATE, RS_C.RS_CONTRACT_SID FROM RS_CONTRACT RS_C JOIN RS_CONTRACT_DETAILS RS_CD ON RS_C.RS_CONTRACT_SID = RS_CD.RS_CONTRACT_SID JOIN RS_MODEL RS_M ON RS_C.RS_MODEL_SID = RS_M.RS_MODEL_SID AND ( RS_M.RS_ID LIKE '?' ) AND ( RS_M.RS_NO LIKE '?' ) AND ( RS_C.RS_NAME LIKE '?' ) AND ( RS_C.REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE LIKE '?' ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE RS_TYPE ON RS_C.RS_TYPE = RS_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( RS_C.RS_TYPE LIKE '?' ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE RS_S ON RS_C.RS_STATUS = RS_S.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( RS_C.RS_STATUS LIKE '?' ) AND ( RS_C.RS_CATEGORY LIKE '?' OR RS_C.RS_CATEGORY IS NULL ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE RS_Cat ON RS_C.RS_CATEGORY = RS_Cat.HELPER_TABLE_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE RSP_TY ON RS_C.REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE = RSP_TY.HELPER_TABLE_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE TR ON RS_C.RS_TRADE_CLASS = TR.HELPER_TABLE_SID ? ? ? ) CRS

SELECT RS_M.RS_ID, RS_M.RS_NO, RS_C.RS_NAME, RS_TYPE.description AS RS_TYPE1, RSP_TY.DESCRIPTION AS REB_P_TYPE, RS_Cat.DESCRIPTION AS RS_CAt, TR.DESCRIPTION AS TRADE, RS_C.RS_DESIGNATION, RS_C.PARENT_RS_ID, RS_C.PARENT_RS_NAME, RS_S.DESCRIPTION AS RS_STATUS6, RS_C.RS_START_DATE, RS_C.RS_END_DATE FROM RS_CONTRACT RS_C JOIN RS_CONTRACT_DETAILS RS_CD ON RS_C.RS_CONTRACT_SID = RS_CD.RS_CONTRACT_SID JOIN RS_MODEL RS_M ON RS_C.RS_MODEL_SID = RS_M.RS_MODEL_SID AND ( RS_M.RS_ID LIKE '?' ) AND ( RS_M.RS_NO LIKE '?' ) AND ( RS_C.RS_NAME LIKE '?' ) AND ( RS_C.REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE LIKE '?' ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE RS_TYPE ON RS_C.RS_TYPE = RS_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( RS_C. RS_TYPE LIKE '?' ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE RS_S ON RS_C.RS_STATUS = RS_S.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND ( RS_C.RS_STATUS LIKE '?' ) AND ( RS_C.RS_CATEGORY LIKE '?' OR RS_C.RS_CATEGORY IS NULL ) LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE RS_Cat ON RS_C.RS_CATEGORY = RS_Cat.HELPER_TABLE_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE RSP_TY ON RS_C.REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE = RSP_TY.HELPER_TABLE_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE TR ON RS_C.RS_TRADE_CLASS = TR.HELPER_TABLE_SID ? ? ?
ORDER BY RS_C.RS_CONTRACT_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count (DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM ITEM_MASTER IM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.ITEM_STATUS AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL.DESCRIPTION FROM ITEM_MASTER IM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.ITEM_STATUS AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count (DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM ITEM_MASTER IM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.ITEM_TYPE AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL.DESCRIPTION FROM ITEM_MASTER IM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.ITEM_TYPE AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT Count(DISTINCT IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID) FROM ITEM_MASTER IM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.ITEM_STATUS AND IM.ITEM_ID LIKE '?' AND IM.ITEM_NO LIKE '?' AND IM.ITEM_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.ITEM_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.ITEM_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND IM.ITEM_ID LIKE '?' AND IM.ITEM_NO LIKE '?' AND IM.ITEM_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.ITEM_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.ITEM_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?'
LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON IM.ITEM_TYPE =HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID

SELECT DISTINCT IM.ITEM_ID, IM.ITEM_NO, IM.ITEM_NAME, HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID FROM ITEM_MASTER IM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.ITEM_STATUS AND IM.ITEM_ID LIKE '?' AND IM.ITEM_NO LIKE '?' AND IM.ITEM_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.ITEM_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.ITEM_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND IM.ITEM_ID LIKE '?' AND IM.ITEM_NO LIKE '?' AND IM.ITEM_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.ITEM_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.ITEM_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON IM.ITEM_TYPE =HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID ORDER BY HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION,HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count(DISTINCT FORMULA_DETAILS_MASTER_SID) FROM FORMULA_DETAILS_MASTER WHERE FORMULA_ID LIKE '?' AND FORMULA_NO LIKE '?' AND FORMULA_DESC LIKE '?'

SELECT FORMULA_ID, FORMULA_NO, FORMULA_DESC, FORMULA_DETAILS_MASTER_SID FROM FORMULA_DETAILS_MASTER WHERE FORMULA_ID LIKE '?' AND FORMULA_NO LIKE '?' AND FORMULA_DESC LIKE '?' ORDER BY FORMULA_DETAILS_MASTER_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count (DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM REBATE_PLAN_MASTER IM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.REBATE_PLAN_STATUS AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL.DESCRIPTION FROM REBATE_PLAN_MASTER IM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.REBATE_PLAN_STATUS AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT Count (DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM REBATE_PLAN_MASTER IM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.REBATE_PLAN_TYPE AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL.DESCRIPTION FROM REBATE_PLAN_MASTER IM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.REBATE_PLAN_TYPE AND HL.DESCRIPTION LIKE '?' ORDER BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT Count(DISTINCT IM.REBATE_PLAN_MASTER_SID) FROM REBATE_PLAN_MASTER IM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.REBATE_PLAN_STATUS AND IM.REBATE_PLAN_ID LIKE '?' AND IM.REBATE_PLAN_NO LIKE '?' AND IM.REBATE_PLAN_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.REBATE_PLAN_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.REBATE_PLAN_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND IM.REBATE_PLAN_ID LIKE '?' AND IM.REBATE_PLAN_NO LIKE '?' AND IM.REBATE_PLAN_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.REBATE_PLAN_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.REBATE_PLAN_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.REBATE_PLAN_TYPE

SELECT DISTINCT IM.REBATE_PLAN_ID, IM.REBATE_PLAN_NO, IM.REBATE_PLAN_NAME, HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION AS TYPE, REBATE_PLAN_MASTER_SID AS SID FROM REBATE_PLAN_MASTER IM JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_STATUS ON HL_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.REBATE_PLAN_STATUS AND IM.REBATE_PLAN_ID LIKE '?' AND IM.REBATE_PLAN_NO LIKE '?' AND IM.REBATE_PLAN_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.REBATE_PLAN_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.REBATE_PLAN_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' AND IM.REBATE_PLAN_ID LIKE '?' AND IM.REBATE_PLAN_NO LIKE '?' AND IM.REBATE_PLAN_NAME LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.REBATE_PLAN_STATUS, '0') LIKE '?' AND Isnull(IM.REBATE_PLAN_TYPE, '0') LIKE '?' JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL_TYPE ON HL_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.REBATE_PLAN_TYPE ORDER BY HL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION,HL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
